name: Rivals of Aether: Panda Etalus
detailed_description:
Overview

The second skin in the Make Your Mark series awarded to FullStream after he won Genesis 6, the Rivals Championship Finals for 2018, on February 3, 2019. In this series, players who win the tournament get to work with the developers to create a skin that is permanently added to the game on Steam. Keep an eye on the Steam Announcements page to see if there are more Mark Your Mark tournaments coming up.

Panda Etalus

  • Themed after the character that FullStream used during Top 8 combined with his sponsor Panda Global.
  • This is a full new set of sprites, not just a skin. Every frame has been updated to turn Etalus from a polar bear into a panda bear.
  • Style on your opponents by taunting them and letting them know your character is top tier while their character is bottom tier.

short_description: A Premium Skin for Etalus. This is the second skin in the Make Your Mark series.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1.2GHz processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1.4GHz processor or faster
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0a
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
